title: Define System Architecture
description: Develop a high-level architecture of the autonomous energy network system.

title: Design Real-time Energy Distribution System
description: Develop a design for the real-time energy distribution system.

title: Develop Energy Management Software
description: Create software that manages and optimizes energy flow within the network in real-time. The software should include features such as load balancing, power usage monitoring, predictive analytics, and energy storage management (considering battery systems or other energy storage solutions).

title: Create User Interface for Monitoring and Control - RFC Review
description: Design a user interface that allows users to monitor and control the energy network in real-time. This includes data visualization, control interfaces for various network components, user authentication and authorization features, and an intuitive design that facilitates easy navigation and interaction. The interface should be designed with consideration for accessibility and responsiveness.

title: Implement Loss Reduction Techniques
description: Research and implement techniques to minimize energy loss in the network.

title: Conduct System Audit and Security Assessment
description: Evaluate the system for potential vulnerabilities and suggest security measures.

title: Write User Manual and Technical Documentation
description: Create user manuals, technical documentation (including usage instructions, troubleshooting guides, API references, architectural overviews), and technical diagrams for the energy network system. Diagrams should illustrate the system architecture, data flow, and key components.
dependencies: Create User Interface for Monitoring and Control
